name: Little Robin
description: Teammates deal 16 more DMG. Loses 8 HP when your turn ends.

name: Mavis
description: When your turn starts (after card drawing), Mavis reduces 1 Energy of random Attack card. Loses 8 HP when your turn ends.

name: Clover
description: When your turn starts, randomly grants 1~2 Leafs to your axies. Clover disappears after 4 leafs are granted.

name: Mushroom
description: When your turn ends, this Mushroom restores 24 HP to your most injured ally and loses 8 HP.
